ModMetaData.name: Colonist Bar KF 0.18.0
ModMetaData.author: Killface
ModMetaData.description:
More options for the Colonist Bar, including new status icons and a mood bar.
Allows custom placement of the bar, as well as advanced scaling and sorting functionality. All options available with Right Mouse Button click on any colonist portrait. FollowMe™ functionality via Middle Mouse Button click.
Includes icon stats based on 'Pawn State Icons™' by Dan Sadler Includes 'FollowMe™' functionality by Fluffy with updated code by alexschrod Includes 'ZoomToMouse™' functionality by Fluffy
Chinese (simplified & traditional) translation by duduluu French translation by Gorgious Russian translation by skyarkhangel (taken from HardCore SK) Spanish translation by Ninnetyer
